name: Road Trip Overdrive
description:
Racing-runner-arcade game with several cars at your disposal.

Gas pedal is stuck, you have to ride forward as far and as fast as you can, doing stunts (all sorts of flips and landings) in the process.

Tap on left or right side to Tilt Your Car. Tap both sides of the screen to Slam Down. Try to complete a few missions and get a few stars.
